source_objects.title: AWS Certification
source_objects.description: Prep for your AWS certification with an AWS course on Udemy. Learn the fundamentals of AWS such as working with a serverless platform, the various frameworks, security and more. With these courses, you’ll build the valuable skills you need to implement cloud initiatives — and open up new career opportunities. If you want to become an AWS developer, we’ve got the course for you.

items.title: Amazon Web Services (AWS) Certified 2022 - 4 Certifications!

visible_instructors.title: BackSpace Academy
visible_instructors.name: BackSpace
visible_instructors.job_title: The fastest route to cloud certification.

items.headline: Videos, labs & practice exams - AWS Certified (Solutions Architect, Developer, SysOps Administrator, Cloud Practitioner)
objectives_summary: You will be fully prepared for the AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate, AWS Certified Developer Associate and AWS Certified SysOps Administrator Associate exams.

items.title: AWS Certified Security Specialty 2022
items.headline: All you need to master AWS Certified Security Specialty certification.
objectives_summary: Will be prepared to give AWS Certified Security Specialty Exam
You will be able to Master the Security aspect of AWS
Gain deep insights about Enterprise grade Security implementation.

items.title: Part 1: AWS Certified Solutions Architect SAA C03 [Updated]
items.headline: AWS Associate Exam - Master Foundations. Join Live Study Group Q&A!
objectives_summary: Breadth of understanding of various AWS services
How to Integrate Services into a Complete Solution
Hands-on Scenario Based Learning

items.title: Practice Test AWS Solutions Architect Associate SAA C03
items.headline: [Updated] In One Hour, You will Gain Substantial Insight to Pass the Certification Exam. Join Live Study Group Q&A!
objectives_summary: Realistic experience on type of questions that you would face in the certification exam
Gain Insight into AWS Services From Certification Perspective
Evaluate Different Architectural Choices

items.title: AWS Certified Solution Architect - Associate
items.headline: Includes 2 Practice Tests - 130 Practice Test Questions
objectives_summary: Students will learn about all the various services offered by AWS
Students will learn how these services work together to build fault tolerant and highly available applications
Students can use the practice questions to get a hang of the type of questions which are asked in the exam

items.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate 2022
items.headline: Beginner to Advanced
objectives_summary: Will be prepared for AWS Solutions Architect - Associate Exam
Get a strong foundation on Amazon Web Services
You will be able to design highly available, scaleable  & secure environment in AWS

items.title: The Ultimate AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate

visible_instructors.title: Bernard Golden
visible_instructors.name: Bernard
visible_instructors.job_title: Cloud consultant, writer, and thought leader

items.headline: Pass the AWS certification exam by mastering the most important AWS services: IAM, EC2, Route 53 (DNS), VPC, and RDS.
objectives_summary: Pass the AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification -- on your first try!
Implement and manage the really tricky AWS services -- VPC, IAM, Route 53 (DNS), and RDS
Operate the most important AWS services correctly

items.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner 2022
items.headline: Beginner to Advanced
objectives_summary: You will have high level overview on what AWS Cloud is all about.
You will be ready to give the AWS Cloud Practitioner certification exam.

items.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional 2022
items.headline: All you need to master AWS Solutions Architect - Professional certification
objectives_summary: Will be prepared to give the AWS Solutions Architect - Professional certification
Gain deep insights into AWS
Gain great understanding about Single-Sign-On Technologies

items.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner - Updated 2020
items.headline: Pass your Cloud Practitioner certification Exam. Includes 175 practice questions
objectives_summary: Understand the basics of Cloud Computing when it comes to AWS
Build virtual servers on the cloud in AWS
Understand how the costing model works in AWS

items.title: AWS Certified Advanced Networking - Specialty 2022
items.headline: All you need to master AWS Certified Advanced Networking - Specialty certification
objectives_summary: Will be prepared to give the AWS Certified Advanced Networking - Specialty certification.
Implement IPSec tunnels as part of Hybrid Infrastructure
Understand and Implement various complex AWS networking architectures

items.title: AWS Certified Security Specialist
items.headline: This course is specially built to prepare you for taking on the AWS Certified Security Specialty Exam
objectives_summary: A deeper understanding on the various security controls on AWS
Confidence to appear for the AWS Security Specialist Exam
